org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue

Class SingleLockQueue<T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue.SingleLockQueue<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, MessageQueue<T>, SynchronizedQueue<T>

    public final class SingleLockQueue<T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements SynchronizedQueue<T>
    A global mutex based synchronized queue.
